title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024)) of the Electoral Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Act 1997 (Section 102) Order
text_raw: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Act 1997 (Section 102) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited electoral act 1997 (section 102) order

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024)) of the Electoral Act 1997
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024)) of the Electoral Act 1997
heading: 2. The period referred to in section 102(2)(a) of the Electoral Act 1997
text_raw:
2. The period referred to in section 102(2)(a) of the Electoral Act 1997 
(No. 25 of 1997) during which election expenses at the Limerick mayoral 
election to be held in the year 2024 shall be reckoned for the purposes of Part 
X of the said Act shall commence on the 8th day of April 2024.
text_norm: 2 period referred section 102(2)(a) electoral act 1997 (no 25 1997) election expense limerick mayoral election held year 2024 shall reckoned purpose part x said act shall commence 8th day april 2024

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024)) of the Electoral Act 1997
heading: 3. The period referred to in the said section 102(2)(b) shall end on the 7th
text_raw:
3. The period referred to in the said section 102(2)(b) shall end on the 7th 

day of June 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 April, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [136] 3
text_norm: 3 period referred said section 102(2)(b) shall end 7th day june 2024 given official seal 8 april 2024 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th april 2024 136 3

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024)) of the Electoral Act 1997
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order determines the period for the reckoning of election expenses 
incurred by or on behalf of a candidate or mayoral election agent at the 
Limerick mayoral election to be held on 7 June 2024, in accordance with 
section 102 of the Electoral Act 1997. 

Section 103 of the said Act specifies a limit on electoral expenditure which 
may be incurred by a candidate or mayoral election agent during the period 
specified in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [136]
